channel.title: Help with wild
channel.description:
Ok so I am on a 562 server and i can attack in clanwars but anywhere else it gives me the message "you need to be in clanwars free-for-all or risked zone to attack" well i was in edge and it gives me a target but i get this message everytime i attack can someone help. P.S Im using r2hd
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/vr3qjk.png[/img]
